column5: Can I use my gf's credit card and have the certificate (boaters card) issued to me? Or after completion of the test will the certificate read her name as completed?
The credit card doesn't need to belong to the person writing the test, not surprisingly.
As long as the credit card comes back authorized you can get one for Homer Simpson....
Great! Thanks guys.. Taking the test now..
I see there is a promotion\registration discount box to fill out.. Whats that all about? Anyone have a code for me?
STURGEMAN!!!!!     Don't do it there's a woman in Verner who gives the test in her house ...I was there last week it cost 40$ and a guaranteed pass.  RFS   Call me at work... 753 9992
Thanks Randy... Too late just passed the exam online. What a crock of crap!!
